```{r setup, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# hadley's settings
set.seed(1014)
options(digits = 3)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE,  # {mine}
  comment = "#>",
  collapse = TRUE,
  # cache = TRUE,
  out.width = "70%",
  fig.align = "center",
  fig.width = 6,
  fig.asp = 0.618,  # 1 / phi
  fig.show = "hold"
)

options(dplyr.print_min = 6, dplyr.print_max = 6)
```

(Follows private issue https://github.com/forestgeo/forestr/issues/13)

```{r}
library(forestr)
```
